# local

**Instance Property**

The local endpoint of the connection in which your protocol is running.

## Declaration

```swift
final var local: NWEndpoint? { get }
```

## Inspecting Instance Properties

- **remote**: The remote endpoint of the connection in which your protocol is running.
- **parameters**: The parameters of the connection in which your protocol is running.
